Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th/Hamilton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #29 State Reroute near State/63rd
ShortDescription: 29 State buses temp. rerouted near State/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/63rd.

Southbound buses will operate via State, 59th, Wells, Marquette, State, and resume normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Marquette, Wentworth, 59th, State, and resume normal route on State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses temp. rerouted NB Clark, Foster, Ashland, Bryn Mawr and Clark; SB Clark, Catalpa, Ashland, Foster and Clark: near Clark/Catalpa.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Clark/Catalpa due to street blockage near Clark/Catalpa.

Northbound buses will operate via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Bryn Mawr and Clark including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Catalpa, Ashland, Foster and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #49 Western Reroute at Western/61st
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted near Western/61st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #55 Garfield Reroute near Garfield/Hamilton
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted near Garfield/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
